# GitHub Configuration

This directory contains repository-level GitHub automation:

- issue templates in `.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/`
- pull request template in `.github/pull_request_template.md`
- labels and labeler config in `.github/labels.json` and `.github/labeler.yml`
- CI/CD and governance workflows in `.github/workflows/`

For profile README content moved out of this directory, see `.github/README-GITHUB.md`.
